channel.title: Softlayer_layout_item on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_layout_item on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Item Service Datatype Description Layout items are used in the customization of the Portal 4 customer experience. Each [[SoftLayer_Layout_Container|container]] in the portal contains one or more layout items. These are used to describe elements such as ticket lists. Layout items typically have [[SoftLayer_Layout_Preference|default preferences]], which can be customized once the container is added to a [[SoftLayer_Layout_Profile|layout profile]]. seeAlso SoftLayer_Layout_Profile SoftLayer_Layout_Container SoftLayer_Layout_Preference Methods getLayoutItemPreferences Retrieve the layout preferences assigned to this layout item getLayoutItemType Retrieve the type of the layout item object getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Layout_Item record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Layout_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Item Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Layout_Item contains definitions for default layout items Local id The internal identifier of a layout item Type: integer keyname The unique key name of the layout item, used primarily for programmatic purposes Type: string layoutItemTypeId The internal identifier of the related [[SoftLayer_Layout_Item_Type]] Type: integer name The friendly name of the layout item Type: string

item.title: getLayoutItemPreferences
item.description: SoftLayer_Layout_Item::getLayoutItemPreferences Overview Retrieve the layout preferences assigned to this layout item Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ItemInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Layout_ItemObjectMask SoftLayer_Layout_ItemObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Layout_Preference[]
